Sentence: Over the next six weeks Newman comes often to the Bellegarde house, more than content to haunt Claire's rooms and attend her (Claire) parties
The next morning, Newman arrives at the Bellegardes' to find Claire's carriage packed
Tristram, who guesses that the Bellegardes want Claire to marry the rich Lord Deepmere instead, though the honest Deepmere ruined things by telling Claire everything at the ball
